Class ec.e.db.RtSpecialCoder

Class ec.e.db.RtSpecialCoder 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.e.db.RtSpecialCoder
final class RtSpecialCoder
extends Object
implements RtSpecialObjectCoder
RtSpecialCoder handles certain classes and data types, namely String, Class, and ObjectArray, that cannot be encoded the normal way since they are used in the encoding process. Like all other classes, objects of these three classes are represented by their index in the typetable, but these three indices are known beforehand, by construction, since this coder encodes these three first.

This class is not public and can therefore cannot be used outside this package.
